Module scheduler
Package customer

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDAOImp
    public interface CustomerDAO
    This interface is for customer data in the DAO format. It is implemented by CustomerDAOImp.
    Version:
    1.0, 01/22/21
    Author:
    Eric Westfall

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCustomerToDatabase​(String name, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String divisionId)
      This method does an INSERT INTO query to insert a customer.
      void addCustomerToMap​(int customerId, String name, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String createdBy, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionId)
      This method adds a customer to the DAO's customer HashMap.
      void deleteCustomer​(int customerId)
      This method does a DELETE query on the customer with ID = customerId.
      void getCustomers()
      This method does a SELECT query to retrieve customers from the database.
      void updateCustomer​(int customerId, String name, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String divisionId)
      This method does an UPDATE query on the customer in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomerToMap

        void addCustomerToMap​(int customerId,
                      String name,
                      String address,
                      String postalCode,
                      String phone,
                      String createdBy,
                      String lastUpdatedBy,
                      int divisionId)
        This method adds a customer to the DAO's customer HashMap.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The customer id.
        name - The String with the customer's name.
        address - The String with the customer's address.
        postalCode - The String with the customer's postal code.
        phone - The String with the customer's phone number.
        createdBy - The String with the customer's creator.
        lastUpdatedBy - The String with the customer's last updated user.
        divisionId - The division id that is the customer's location.

      • addCustomerToDatabase

        void addCustomerToDatabase​(String name,
                           String address,
                           String postalCode,
                           String phone,
                           String divisionId)
        This method does an INSERT INTO query to insert a customer.
        Parameters:
        name - The String with the customer's name.
        address - The String with the customer's address.
        postalCode - The String with the customer's postal code.
        phone - The String with the customer's phone number.
        divisionId - The division id that is the customer's location.

      • deleteCustomer

        void deleteCustomer​(int customerId)
        This method does a DELETE query on the customer with ID = customerId.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The id of the customer to delete.

      • getCustomers

        void getCustomers()
        This method does a SELECT query to retrieve customers from the database.

      • updateCustomer

        void updateCustomer​(int customerId,
                    String name,
                    String address,
                    String postalCode,
                    String phone,
                    String divisionId)
        This method does an UPDATE query on the customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The id of the customer.
        name - The String with the customer's name.
        address - The String with the customer's address.
        postalCode - The String with the customer's postal code.
        phone - The String with the customer's phone number.
        divisionId - The division id that is the customer's location.
